replies.msg:
【please spread out】

To people all around the world,

We, Hongkongers, have just fallen victim to a terrorist attack planned and executed by the Hong Kong Police Force. At about 10pm 31 August 2019, police officers rushed into Prince Edward railway station, entered the carriage and indiscriminately beat up commuters, regardless of whether they were protesters or just ordinary passengers. They ignored the laws about weapon use and fired tear gas inside the carriage, which could have been lethal. Also, they seriously wounded innocent people - there were numerous blood shed incidences. Some passengers kneeled before them and pleaded them to stop but after that they were beaten up even harder. Meanwhile, the police did not arrest the passengers after they were beaten up. The only purpose of their brutality was to harm people but not to disperse the crowd.

We, Hongkongers, are suffering from a humanitarian crisis and we hope that people all over the world can join us in the fight against totalitarianism. Thank you for your support and we will stay strong.

Hongkongers
